channel.title: Started the server alright..Then..DISASTER!11!one!
channel.description:
Yeah, I got everything working with the help of the trusty old "Search" button, and a few great tutorials on the forum, but for some odd reason, every time I try to connect to my server, it disconnects me almost right away.
I get the screen with the chat box, and it says stuff like "Type "blah blah" for the "blah" menu" and that sort of thing, but then it just stops responding, and I have to restart MoparScape.
If I've missed something on the tutorials, or search page, feel free to brand me with "IDIOT", but i'm pretty sure I didn't..
Help? :confused:

item.title: Started the server alright..Then..DISASTER!11!one!
item.dc:creator: @xaioxaio229 xaioxaio229
item.description:
@xaioxaio229 wrote:

It’s working! Now how do i get my friends to connect via Hamachi? Do i just make a network, and tell them the ip to join on, or is it too complicatedto explain in words?

By the way, your name is exactly what i have been not getting because of this… :([/quote]

Yes Make A Network Tell Your Friends The Network Name And Pas and ip

Read full topic

:d

item.title: Started the server alright..Then..DISASTER!11!one!
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

Restart both your server and your client (MoparScape) then try to connect again.

Everyon makes mistakes, so don’t worry.

Read full topic

item.title: Started the server alright..Then..DISASTER!11!one!
item.dc:creator: @Rofflecakes Rofflecakes
item.description:
@Rofflecakes wrote:

Don’t mind taking an English lesson so you can ask stupid questions properly next time?

It means “Tutorial”.

It’s on almost every page that says “Runescape” on this forum … The posts start with “[TUT]” or something to that effect are usually Tutorials, or stereotypical Egyptian names (unlikely…but possible)…

If you don’t know that, then i don’t think you’re going to be able to help me with my problem.

I’ll change it so that idiots people like you can understand it better.

Read full topic
